summary: An ordinance relating to (official) bonds to be given by certain officers and employees of The City of Seattle; prescribing the amounts and conditions thereof; repealing Ordinances Nos. 15727, 24181, 24317, 34287, 37305, 39419, 40470, 41250, 44909, 45432, 45670, 48491, 55351, 55669, 57254 and 57602; repealing Section 4 of Ordinance No. 36906; repealing Section 4 of Ordinance No. 38896; and repealing all other ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict or inconsistent herewith.
